description:
Learn to make cardboard ruins for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

For more information on DM crafting visit my website and see what you need for your starting DM crafting kit:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft

Music: "Epic Battle And War Music," under royalty free license from Footage Firm Inc.
title: DIY 3D Ruins from Cardboard Miniature Terrain (Dm's Craft #104 Step 2)
